# Ghost — The Private Agent OS

> Ghost is a private, local-first **Agent OS** for desktop (Windows, macOS, Linux) and mobile (Android, iOS).
> It indexes local files, provides hybrid semantic + keyword search, connects to 10,000+ tools via
> the complete 2026 agent protocol stack (MCP, MCP Apps, AG-UI, A2UI, A2A, WebMCP), and runs AI agents
> that take actions on your behalf — all with on-device inference, zero cloud dependencies.

## Key Facts

- **License**: MIT (open source core) + planned Pro tier
- **Stack**: Tauri v2 (Rust backend) + React 18/TypeScript (frontend) + SQLite/sqlite-vec + Candle (native ML) + rmcp (MCP SDK)
- **Privacy**: 100% local. Zero telemetry. Zero cloud dependencies. Zero analytics.
- **Current Version**: 0.11.0
- **Platforms**: Windows (x64), macOS (ARM64 + Intel), Linux (DEB, RPM, AppImage), Android (APK)
- **Installer Size**: <10MB
- **RAM Usage**: <40MB idle
- **Cold Start**: <500ms

## Architecture

Ghost uses a 6-layer Agent OS architecture:

1. **Frontend**: React 18 / TypeScript strict + Tailwind CSS v4 (Omnibox, Results, Chat, A2UI Renderer, Settings)
2. **AG-UI Runtime**: Bidirectional agent↔user streaming (~16 event types via CopilotKit protocol)
3. **IPC Bridge**: Tauri v2 command system (type-safe invoke)
4. **Agent Engine**: ReAct loop with native llama.cpp grammar-constrained tool calling, 3-tier safety, conversation memory
5. **Protocol Hub**: MCP Server + Client (rmcp), MCP Apps (coming), A2A (Google), AG-UI (CopilotKit), A2UI (Google), WebMCP (W3C)
6. **Core Engine + AI Layer**: File watcher, text extraction, Candle embeddings (all-MiniLM-L6-v2 384D), Qwen2.5-Instruct GGUF (0.5B–7B), sqlite-vec, FTS5

## Core Features

- **Hybrid Search**: FTS5 keyword (<5ms) + sqlite-vec KNN vector search (<500ms) combined via Reciprocal Rank Fusion (RRF, k=60)
- **Native AI Inference**: In-process Candle BERT embeddings — no Ollama, no GPU, no internet required after first model download (~23MB)
- **Native Chat**: Qwen2.5-Instruct GGUF (0.5B/1.5B/3B/7B) via Candle — hardware-aware auto-selection by RAM
- **Agent Engine**: ReAct (Reason + Act) loop, native llama.cpp tool calling with GBNF grammar constraints
- **MCP Protocol Hub**: Server (expose Ghost tools) + Client (connect to 10,000+ external MCP servers) via rmcp
- **AG-UI Streaming**: ~16 event types, SSE endpoint, Tauri IPC events, useAgui React hook
- **A2UI Renderer**: Google A2UI v0.9 — 17+ component types rendered as React/Tailwind with data binding
- **MCP Apps**: Sandboxed interactive tool UIs rendered in-conversation (official MCP extension, coming next)
- **Skills System**: SKILL.md parser with YAML frontmatter, trigger matching, SkillRegistry
- **Spotlight-like UX**: Ctrl/Cmd+Space floating window, auto-hide, keyboard-first
- **File Indexing**: PDF, DOCX, XLSX, TXT, Markdown, 50+ code file types
- **Zero-config**: Auto-discovers user directories, auto-selects AI models by hardware

## Open Protocols

| Protocol | Standard | Purpose |
| --- | --- | --- |
| MCP | Linux Foundation / AAIF | Tool integration (10,000+ servers) |
| MCP Apps | Anthropic / MCP Extension | Interactive tool UIs in-conversation |
| AG-UI | CopilotKit (MIT) | Agent↔user real-time streaming |
| A2UI | Google (Apache 2.0) | Generative UI from JSON |
| A2A | Google / Linux Foundation | Multi-agent coordination |
| WebMCP | W3C incubation | Browser tool contracts |
